question: What do we call the reaction when an acid and a base react together to form salt and water?
explanation: When an acid and a base react together to form salt and water, the reaction is known as Neutralisation Reaction. HCl (aq) + NaOH (aq) ? H2O (l) + NaCl (aq) (acid) (base) (Water) (Salt) Hydrochloric acid Sodium hydroxide Sodium Chloride
